 HR Manager support duties:
- Support HR Manager establishes policy, regulation, procedures and documents in recruitment and training.
- Provide guidelines and monitor for the implementation of the policy and procedures of subsidiaries’ recruitment and training activities
- Support HR Manager establishes recruitment and training plans, strategies for next quarter and next year. 
- Suggest and monitor recruitment and training budgets.

 Recruitment duties:
- Establish recruitment plan for new projects, stores, branches and subsidiaries.
- Analyze and select appropriate recruitment channels.
- Prepare, design and carry out job ads in newspaper, online recruitment websites and contact recruitment agencies (head hunting service) and others.
- Search, screen and select candidate's resume.
- Call interview and direct interview qualified/potential candidates.
- Schedule interview plan for HR Manage, Head of Dept, subsidiaries’ Manager and General Director.
- Negotiate salary with candidates.
- Follow up probation period all new employees.
- Manage a Recruitment Staff.
 Training duties:
- Identify training needs based on the result of performance appraisal program, conferring with managers and supervisors, Customer Service's feedback 
- Analyse training needs to develop new training programs or modify and improve existing programs. 
- Search and suggest instructors or training center to conduct training. 
- Establish, execute and coordinate all training programs (in-house and external).
- Monitor, evaluate and record all training activities.
- Monitor on & off-the-job training, count working days and execute payroll for trainees in training program of new project.
- Design and conduct the new employee orientation.
- Establish and monitor the integration training for new employees – (Manager and Supervisor level).
- Establish and provide guidelines, manage and follow up employees’ individual commitment to training course.
